question: The first governor of Andhra Pradesh that was formed on 1<sup>st</sup> Nov 1956:
explanation:
Chandulal Madhavlal Trivedi  was the first governor of Andhra Pradesh that was formed on 1<sup>st</sup> Nov 1956.
He also served as first & last governor of Andhra state that was formed on 1<sup>st</sup> Oct 1953.
